dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Hi, how can I help you?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm looking for a quest to complete. Do you have any available?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Yes, I have a quest for you. Are you interested?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Definitely! What do I need to do?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: You need to retrieve a magical artifact from the ancient temple of XYZ. It won't be easy, but the reward will be worth it.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Count me in! I'll head to the temple right away.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Good luck on your quest, adventurer!
